verbose_text: In addition, Yu et al. demonstrated that miR-124 promotes microglia M2 polarization and attenuates inflammatory response by directly targeting the 3'UTR of C/EBP-alpha for repression in intracerebral hemorrhage.
evidence: miR-124 promotes microglia M2 polarization and attenuates inflammatory response by directly targeting the 3'UTR of C/EBP-alpha
